name: Aquaritus
description:
Eugene is a mad scientist with a mad problem: there's a chemical in the water that’s endangering the fish! Thus, Eugene decides to solve this problem the only logical way--shrink himself down to fish size and explore his aquarium while mind-controlling random fish to do his bidding. 

A 3D Action Puzzle Game culminating with a deadly shark encounter, Aquaritus allows you to explore an aquarium as a shrunken mad-scientist while using his mind control device on fish and sea creatures. Consume (that's right, drink) the chemical as you go and increase your swimming abilities to escape.
